mapper.insert: insert into building (building_id, building_name, longitude, latitude, building_describe, building_image, campus, room_num, Capacity, building_manager, status) values (#{buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buildingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{buildingDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildingImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{campus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{capacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{buildingManager,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update building set building_name = #{buildingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, building_describe = #{buildingDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, building_image = #{buildingImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, campus = #{campus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_num = #{roomNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Capacity = #{capacity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, building_manager = #{buildingManager,jdbcType=CHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where building_id = #{buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select building_id, building_name, longitude, latitude, building_describe, building_image, campus, room_num, Capacity, building_manager, status from building where building_id = #{buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select building_id, building_name, longitude, latitude, building_describe, building_image, campus, room_num, Capacity, building_manager, status from building
